description:
Non-material amendment to planning permission LBI Ref. P110434 dated 23 November 2011.  The amendments are summarised below:

a) Changes to internal layouts, primarily at ground floor level
b) The addition of sedum roof to rear flat roofs of houses 3 and 5
c) Removal of entrance ramp to house 4
d) Adjustments to the size and precise location of windows
e) Changes to the design of the rear bay kitchen windows at first floor level
f) Adjustments to sliding box rooflights  houses 3 and 5
g) The precise height of the existing rear boundary wall is shown
decision_conditions: REASON: The proposed amendments in particular to alter the roof form, adjustment of sliding box rooflight, lowering of window cills to create door openings, increase in bay windows size and installation of new balustrades are considered to be a material change to the scheme allowed on appeal in  November 2011 under ref. P110434 (PINS Ref. APP/V5570/A/11/2156913).  Changes of this type require full planning permission.
